meanings.sent1: The priest was beneficed with a comfortable living in the parish.
meanings.sent2: She beneficed from the generous donation to the church.
meanings.sent3: The cat beneficed from the warm sunbeam coming through the window.
meanings.sent4: The flowers beneficed from the rain, blooming beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The students beneficed from the extra study session before the exam.

meanings.sent1: The beneficed clergyman was well-respected in the community.
meanings.sent2: She admired the beneficed position of the vicar in the church.
meanings.sent3: The cat felt beneficed with a cozy bed to sleep in.
meanings.sent4: The garden looked beneficed with colorful flowers in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The students were beneficed with a field trip to the museum.
